page.title: 16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATRINA.
page.content: I get up at 8o'clock,have my breakfast and at 8.45 my friend Elaine calls for me.We walk to school and sometimes we meet Mrs Jessop our school teacher. School starts at 9.15 and Mrs Jessop takes the register to see if everyone is here.First lesson starts at 9.25 we have Maths with Mrs Pickard,we have just finished angles and they were hard.Next we have History and this lasts till dinner time. We have an hour for dinner till 1:00.My favourite dinner is Fish Fingers,Beans a Chips. In the afternoons we lessons like Art,Craft,P.E. and Games.The girls play Rounders and the boys play Cricket. After school there are many different acvities you can go to.I go to Athletics. Some nights Ihave Youth Club from 5:00 till 7:00.
